actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to modify the third-year tax cut for individuals with taxable incomes over $50,000.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the reduction in tax rates scheduled for July 1, 1983 for individuals with a taxable income over $50,000 ($100,000 for joint return).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to modify the third-year tax cut for individuals with taxable incomes over $50,000.
